about_the_game:
Kitty Clicker is a fun and addictive idle clicker game where you collect wooly balls and upgrade your production through shop to become the ultimate feline overlord. The game is simple to play, but it is also challenging and rewarding. You will need to carefully manage your resources and make strategic decisions in order to succeed.

Key features:
Idle gameplay: Kitty Clicker is perfect for players who want to relax and have fun without having to spend a lot of time playing. The game will continue to generate wooly balls even when you are away from your pc.

Many different cats and places to collect: There are quite a few of different cats and places to collect in Kitty Clicker, each with their own unique look.

A few flying birds: If you get a chance to meet one, click on it and your production will go into frenzy (x5) for 10 seconds.

Tons of upgrades: You can use the wooly balls you collect to upgrade your production. There are many different upgrades available, each at their own cost with its own production.

If you are a fan of idle clicker games or cat-themed games, then Kitty Clicker is the perfect game for you. Download it today and start your journey to become the ultimate feline overlord!

name: Kitty Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Classic, or newer
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 110 MB available space

short_description: Purrfectly addictive gameplay! Click, collect, and upgrade your way to the top. Dozens of adorable cats await!
